name: PuzzleRunner
description:
Note: Windows Defender sometimes detects the file as "Program:Win32/Wacapew.C!ml". You can check the virusTotal Scan here https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/606a21b0e51d993d974295ae38b9cb27564ccb27c72d...

Made in 72 Hours for the SoloDevelopment Winter Jam under the theme "The end is near".  I highly recommend playing this with a mouse (unless you like suffering).
